about:
Hello! I'm **Kevin**,
 a self-taught Frontend Developer.
I am danish living in the UK, England, Surrey.

 In early 2020 I started learning how to code and discovered my love for coding & Linux.

 Learning is a big part of who I am. I love expanding my knowledge base and gaining as much expertise as I can in any given field.

 I am currently learning Neovim as my IDE and learning back-end with Nodejs
